src/iocdf.c

00001 /* By R. Hallberg 7/99                                                */
00002 /*   This file contains a subroutine that will create a netcdf file   */
00003 /* or a binary file, a subroutine write a field to that file, a       */
00004 /* subroutine to name a file given a root-name and a time,            */
00005 /* time, binary file, a subroutine to name a file given a root and a   */
00006 
00007 #include <ctype.h>
00008 #include <stddef.h>
00009 #include <stdio.h>
00010 #include <stdlib.h>
00011 #include <string.h>
00012 #include <math.h>
00013 #include "init.h"
00014 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00015 #include <netcdf.h>
00016 #endif
00017 #include "metrics.h"
00018 #include "io.h"
00019 #include "iocdf.h"
00020 #include "offtrac.h"
00021 #include "par_IO.h"

00024 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00025 extern double latq[NYMEM];          /* The latitude of q points.     */
00026 extern double lath[NYMEM];          /* The latitude of h points.     */
00027 extern double lonq[NXMEM];          /* The longitude of q points.    */
00028 extern double lonh[NXMEM];          /* The longitude of h points.    */
00029 # if defined(PARALLEL_Y) && !defined(PARALLEL_IO)
00030 double lath_tot[NYTOT+Y1];           /* The latitude of all points in */
00031 double latq_tot[NYTOT+Y1];           /* the whole domain.             */
00032 # endif
00033 # if defined(PARALLEL_X) && !defined(PARALLEL_IO)
00034 double lonh_tot[NXTOT+X1];           /* The longitude of all points   */
00035 double lonq_tot[NXTOT+X1];           /* in the whole domain.          */
00036 # endif
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 double io_field_d[(NXTOT+1)*(NYTOT+1)]; /* A global field that        */
00040                                      /* is used in all double pre-    */
00041                                      /* cision I/O.                   */
00042 
00043 extern void quit(int status);
00044 
00045 #if defined(PARALLEL_X) || defined(PARALLEL_Y)
00046 extern int pe_here;                  /* The current processor's label.*/
00047 extern int procs_used;      /*   The number of processors actually    */
00048                             /* used in the present simulation.        */
00049 #else
00050 # undef PARALLEL_IO
00051 # define pe_here 0                   /* Without running in parallel,  */
00052                                      /* the current processor is 0.   */
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #ifdef PARALLEL_X
00056 extern int nx;        //void step_fields(double day);
00057                /* The number of x-points in the */
00058                                      /* physical domain calculated by */
00059                                      /* the current processor.        */
00060 extern int X0abs;                    /* The absolute index of X0 on   */
00061                                      /* the current processor, rel-   */
00062                                      /* ative to X0 on processor 0.   */
00063 #else
00064 # define X0abs 0                     /* X0abs on processor 0 is 0.    */
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #ifdef PARALLEL_Y
00068 extern int ny;                       /* The number of y-points in the */
00069                                      /* physical domain calculated by */
00070                                      /* the current processor.        */
00071 extern int Y0abs;                    /* The absolute index of Y0 on   */
00072                                      /* the current processor, rel-   */
00073                                      /* ative to Y0 on processor 0.   */
00074 #else
00075 # define Y0abs 0                     /* Y0abs on processor 0 is 0.    */
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 size_t write_field(int cdfid, FILE *fileptr, struct vardesc vars,
00079                    struct varcdfinfo varinfo, size_t nrec, double *variable)
00080 {
00081 
00082 /*   This subrountine will write a full variable, either 1 snapshot of */
00083 /* a timeseries or a single field.  If a netcdf file is used, cdfid    */
00084 /* contains the ID number of the open netcdf file (if non-negative) or */
00085 /* -1 for a non-writing PE if PE 0 is writing a single-threaded netCDF */
00086 /* file.  If a binary file is to be written, cdfid is either -4 (for a */
00087 /* file containing 4-byte floating point numbers) or -8 (for a file    */
00088 /* containing 8-byte floating point numbers).  fileptr points to an    */
00089 /* open binary file.  vars contains the variable descriptions in a     */
00090 /* structure of type vardesc.  varinfo is a structure of type          */
00091 /* varcdfinfo which is obtained from create_file.  nrec is the time    */
00092 /* index number of a netCDF file.  variable is a pointer to the first  */
00093 /* element of the array to be written.                                 */
00094 
00095 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00096   if (cdfid > -4) {
00097     int status;
00098     char message[144];
00099     size_t start[4] = {0,0,0,0};
00100 
00101     start[0] = nrec;
00102 
00103 
00104     if ((nrec == 0) || (vars.t_grid != '1')) {
00105       if (vars.hor_grid == '1') {
00106         if (cdfid >= 0) {
00107           if (vars.t_grid == '1')  {
00108             status = nc_put_var_double(cdfid, varinfo.id, variable);
00109             if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00110               strcpy(message,"put "); strcat(message,vars.name);
00111               handle_error(message,status);
00112             }
00113           }
00114           else {
00115             printf("writing %s\n", vars.name);
00116             status = nc_put_vara_double(cdfid, varinfo.id, start,
00117                                         varinfo.count, variable);
00118             if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00119               strcpy(message,"put a "); strcat(message,vars.name);
00120               handle_error(message,status);
00121             }
00122           }
00123         }
00124       }
00125       else {
00126 # if (defined(PARALLEL_Y) || defined(PARALLEL_X)) && !defined(PARALLEL_IO)
00127         double out_array[(NXTOT+1)*(NYTOT+1)];
00128         int zindex, i, j, k;
00129 
00130         if (vars.z_grid == '1') {zindex = 3;}
00131         else if (vars.t_grid == '1') zindex = 0;
00132         else  zindex = 1;
00133 
00134         varinfo.count[zindex] = 1;
00135         for (k=0;k<varinfo.z_size;k++) {
00136           start[zindex] = k;
00137           collect_double_fields(variable+k*NXMEM*NYMEM,
00138                       (NXTOT+1-varinfo.x_size),(NYTOT+1-varinfo.y_size));
00139           if (pe_here == 0) {
00140             for (i=0;i<varinfo.x_size;i++) for (j=0;j<varinfo.y_size;j++)
00141               out_array[j*varinfo.x_size+i] = io_field_d[i*varinfo.y_size+j];
00142             status = nc_put_vara_double(cdfid, varinfo.id, start,
00143                                         varinfo.count, &out_array[0]);
00144             if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00145               sprintf(message,"putting layer %d of ",k); strcat(message,vars.name);
00146               handle_error(message,status);
00147             }
00148           }
00149         }
00150 # else
00151 /*  With 2-D or 3-D arrays, the data is copied to another field to     */
00152 /*  eliminate the halo regions.                                        */
00153         double out_array[NXMEM*NYMEM*(NZ+1)];
00154         int i, j, k, xst, yst, xysize;
00155 
00156         xst = nx-varinfo.x_size+1; yst = ny-varinfo.y_size+1; 
00157         xysize = varinfo.y_size*varinfo.x_size;
00158 
00159         printf("writing %s\n", vars.name);
00160         for (k=0;k<varinfo.z_size;k++) {
00161           for (i=xst;i<=nx;i++) for (j=yst;j<=ny;j++) {
00162               out_array[k*xysize + (j-yst)*varinfo.x_size + (i-xst)] = 
00163                     variable[k*NXMEM*NYMEM + i*NYMEM + j];
00164               /* DEBUG if (fabs(variable[k*NXMEM*NYMEM + i*NYMEM + j]) > 1e+35)
00165                 printf("out_array(%d,%d,%d)=%g\n",k,i,j,
00166                 variable[k*NXMEM*NYMEM + i*NYMEM + j]); */
00167           }
00168         }
00169         status = nc_put_vara_double(cdfid, varinfo.id, start,
00170                                     varinfo.count, &out_array[0]);
00171 
00172         if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00173           strcpy(message,"put m "); strcat(message,vars.name);
00174           handle_error(message,status);
00175         }
00176 # endif
00177       }
00178     }
00179 
00180     return 1;
00181   }
00182   else
00183 #endif
00184   {
00185     int k, nlay;
00186     size_t err = 1;
00187 
00188     if (vars.z_grid == '1') nlay = 1;
00189     else if (vars.z_grid == 'L') nlay = NZ;
00190     else if (vars.z_grid == 'i')  nlay = NZ+1;
00191     else nlay = 0;
00192 
00193     if (vars.hor_grid == '1') {
00194       if (pe_here == 0) err *= fwrite((void *)variable,8*nlay,1,fileptr);
00195     }
00196     else {
00197       for (k=0;k<nlay;k++) {
00198         if (cdfid < -4)
00199           err *= write_layer(&variable[k*NXMEM*NYMEM],fileptr,0);
00200         else
00201           err *= write_layer(&variable[k*NXMEM*NYMEM],fileptr,1);
00202       }
00203     }
00204 
00205     return err;
00206     
00207   }
00208 }
00209 
00210 size_t write_time(int cdfid, FILE *fileptr, int timeid, size_t nrec, 
00211                   double *day)
00212 {
00213 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00214   if (cdfid > -4) {
00215     if (cdfid >= 0) {
00216       int status;
00217 
00218       status = nc_put_var1_double(cdfid, timeid, &nrec, day);
00219       if (status != NC_NOERR)
00220         handle_error("Writing time ",status);
00221     }
00222     return 1;
00223   }
00224   else
00225 #endif
00226   {
00227     size_t err = 1;
00228     if (pe_here==0) err *= fwrite((void *)day,8,1,fileptr);
00229     return err;
00230   }
00231 }
00232 void create_file(char filename[], int type, struct vardesc vars[], int novars,
00233                  FILE **fileptr, int *cdfid, int *timeid, 
00234                  struct varcdfinfo varinfo[], int output_prec_float)
00235 {
00236 
00237 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00238   if (type != NETCDF_FILE)
00239 #endif
00240   {
00241     if (pe_here == 0) *fileptr = fopen(filename,"w");
00242     else *fileptr = NULL;
00243 
00244     if (type == FLOAT_FILE) *cdfid = -4;
00245     else *cdfid = -8;
00246     return;
00247   }
00248 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00249   else {
00250     int lathvid, lonhvid, latqvid, lonqvid;
00251     int use_lath = 0, use_lonh = 0, use_latq = 0, use_lonq = 0;
00252     int layervid, layer2vid, intvid;
00253     int use_layer = 0, use_layer2 = 0, use_int = 0;
00254     int dayvid, daystvid;
00255 
00256     int k, status, junk, layer[NZ];
00257 # ifdef PARALLEL_IO
00258     int domain[4];
00259 # endif
00260     float interface[NZ+1];
00261     char message[144];
00262     size_t xhsize, yhsize, xqsize, yqsize;
00263 
00264 #define OUTPUT_DEFS
00265 #ifdef OUTPUT_DEFS
00266     int dummy, kdmlvid, kdvid, khtrvid, tauvid;
00267     float kdml = KDML; // need to copy from macro to variable
00268     float kd = KD;     // so pointer can be used in nc_put_var_float call
00269     float khtr = KHTR;
00270     extern const double r_bio_tau;
00271 #endif /* OUTPUT_DEFS */
00272 
00273 /*  Define the sizes in the file of the various axes.                 */
00274 
00275 # ifdef PARALLEL_IO
00276     xhsize = nx-X0; yhsize = ny-Y0;
00277 # else
00278     xhsize = NXTOT; yhsize = NYTOT;
00279 # endif
00280 # ifdef REENTRANT
00281     xqsize = xhsize;
00282 # else
00283     xqsize = xhsize+1;
00284 # endif
00285 # ifdef REENTRANT_Y
00286     yqsize = yhsize;
00287 # else
00288     yqsize = yhsize+1;
00289 # endif
00290 
00291 
00292 /*   Define the NetCDF file to which output will be written.          */
00293     if ((strncmp(&filename[strlen(filename)-4],".cdf",4) != 0) &&
00294         (strncmp(&filename[strlen(filename)-3],".nc",3)))
00295       strcat(filename,".cdf");
00296 # ifdef PARALLEL_IO
00297     {
00298       char suffix[6];
00299       sprintf(suffix,".%04d",pe_here);
00300       strcat(filename,suffix);
00301     }
00302 # elif defined(PARALLEL_Y) || defined(PARALLEL_X)
00303     if (pe_here != 0) {
00304       *cdfid = -1;
00305       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) {
00306         switch (vars[k].hor_grid) {
00307           case 'u': varinfo[k].x_size = xqsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yhsize; break;
00308           case 'v': varinfo[k].x_size = xhsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yqsize; break;
00309           case 'h': varinfo[k].x_size = xhsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yhsize; break;
00310           case 'q': varinfo[k].x_size = xqsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yqsize; break;
00311           case '1': break;
00312           default: fprintf(stderr,"Unknown horizontal axes[%d] %c.\n",k,vars[k].hor_grid);
00313         }
00314         switch (vars[k].z_grid) {
00315           case 'L': varinfo[k].z_size = NZ; break;
00316           case 'i': varinfo[k].z_size = NZ+1; break;
00317           case '2': varinfo[k].z_size = 2; break;
00318           case '1': varinfo[k].z_size = 1; break;
00319           default: fprintf(stderr,"Unknown layer axis[%d] %c.\n",k,vars[k].z_grid);
00320         }
00321       }
00322 
00323       return;
00324     }
00325 # endif
00326 
00327     status = nc_create(filename, NC_CLOBBER, cdfid);
00328      if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00329       strcpy(message,"Opening "); strcat(message,filename);
00330       handle_error(message,status);
00331     }
00332 
00333 # ifdef PARALLEL_IO
00334     {
00335       status = nc_put_att_int (*cdfid, NC_GLOBAL, "NumFilesInSet",
00336                                 NC_INT, 1, &procs_used);
00337       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Att NumFilesInSet",status);
00338     }
00339 # endif
00340 
00341     status = nc_set_fill(*cdfid, NC_NOFILL, &junk);         /* set nofill */
00342     if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Set Fill",status);
00343 
00344 /*   Define the coordinate variables.                                 */
00345     {
00346       int lathid, lonhid, latqid, lonqid;
00347       int layerid, lay2id, intid;
00348       int dayid, dayavid = 0, monthid = 0;
00349 
00350       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) 
00351         if ((vars[k].hor_grid == 'h') || (vars[k].hor_grid == 'u')) {
00352           use_lath = 1; break;
00353         }
00354 
00355       if (use_lath == 1) {
00356         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "lath", yhsize, &lathid);
00357         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim lath",status);
00358         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "lath", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &lathid, &lathvid);
00359         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var lath",status);
00360         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lathvid, "long_name", 9, "Latitude");
00361         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name lath",status);
00362         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lathvid, "units", 8, "degrees");
00363         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units lath",status);
00364 # ifdef REENTRANT_Y
00365         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lathvid, "modulo", 1, "");
00366         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("modulo lath",status);
00367 # endif
00368 # if defined(PARALLEL_IO) && defined(PARALLEL_Y)
00369         domain[0] = 1; domain[1] = NYTOT; 
00370         domain[2] = Y0abs+1; domain[3] = Y0abs+yhsize;
00371         status = nc_put_att_int(*cdfid, lathvid, "domain_decomposition",
00372                                 NC_INT, 4, domain);
00373         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("domain lath",status);
00374 # endif
00375       }
00376 
00377       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) 
00378         if ((vars[k].hor_grid == 'q') || (vars[k].hor_grid == 'v')) {
00379           use_latq = 1; break;
00380       }
00381 
00382       if (use_latq == 1) {
00383         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "latq", yqsize, &latqid);
00384         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim latq",status);
00385         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "latq", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &latqid, &latqvid);
00386         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var latq",status);
00387         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, latqvid, "long_name", 9, "Latitude");
00388         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name latq",status);
00389         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, latqvid, "units", 8, "degrees");
00390         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units latq",status);
00391 # ifdef REENTRANT_Y
00392         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, latqvid, "modulo", 1, "");
00393         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("modulo latq",status);
00394 # endif
00395 # if defined(PARALLEL_IO) && defined(PARALLEL_Y)
00396         domain[0] = 1+yhsize-yqsize; domain[1] = NYTOT; 
00397         domain[2] = Y0abs+1+yhsize-yqsize; domain[3] = Y0abs+yhsize;
00398         status = nc_put_att_int(*cdfid, latqvid, "domain_decomposition",
00399                                 NC_INT, 4, domain);
00400         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("domain latq",status);
00401 # endif
00402       }
00403 
00404       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) 
00405         if ((vars[k].hor_grid == 'h') || (vars[k].hor_grid == 'v')) {
00406           use_lonh = 1; break;
00407         }
00408 
00409       if (use_lonh == 1) {
00410         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "lonh", xhsize, &lonhid);
00411         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim lonh",status);
00412         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "lonh", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &lonhid, &lonhvid);
00413         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var lonh",status);
00414         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lonhvid, "long_name", 10, "Longitude");
00415         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name lonh",status);
00416         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lonhvid, "units", 8, "degrees");
00417         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units lonh",status);
00418 # ifdef REENTRANT
00419         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lonhvid, "modulo", 1, "");
00420         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("modulo lonh",status);
00421 # endif
00422 # if defined(PARALLEL_IO) && defined(PARALLEL_X)
00423         domain[0] = 1; domain[1] = NXTOT; 
00424         domain[2] = X0abs+1; domain[3] = X0abs+xhsize;
00425         status = nc_put_att_int(*cdfid, lonhvid, "domain_decomposition",
00426                                 NC_INT, 4, domain);
00427         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("domain lonh",status);
00428 # endif
00429       }
00430 
00431       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) 
00432         if ((vars[k].hor_grid == 'q') || (vars[k].hor_grid == 'u')) {
00433           use_lonq = 1; break;
00434         }
00435 
00436       if (use_lonq == 1) {
00437         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "lonq", xqsize, &lonqid);
00438         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim lonq",status);
00439         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "lonq", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &lonqid, &lonqvid);
00440         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var lonq",status);
00441         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lonqvid, "long_name", 10, "Longitude");
00442         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name lonq",status);
00443         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lonqvid, "units", 8, "degrees");
00444         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units lonq",status);
00445 # ifdef REENTRANT
00446         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, lonqvid, "modulo", 1, "");
00447         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("modulo lonq",status);
00448 # endif
00449 # if defined(PARALLEL_IO) && defined(PARALLEL_X)
00450         domain[0] = 1+xhsize-xqsize; domain[1] = NXTOT; 
00451         domain[2] = X0abs+1+xhsize-xqsize; domain[3] = X0abs+xhsize;
00452         status = nc_put_att_int(*cdfid, lonqvid, "domain_decomposition",
00453                                 NC_INT, 4, domain);
00454         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("domain lonq",status);
00455 # endif
00456       }
00457 
00458       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) if (vars[k].z_grid == 'L') {
00459         use_layer = 1; break;
00460       }
00461       if (use_layer == 1) {
00462         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "Layer", (size_t) NZ, &layerid);
00463         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim Layer",status);
00464         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "Layer", NC_INT, 1, &layerid, &layervid);
00465         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var Layer",status);
00466         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, layervid, "units", 6, "Layer");
00467         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units layer",status);
00468       }
00469 
00470       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) if (vars[k].z_grid == 'i') {
00471           use_int = 1; break;
00472       }
00473       if (use_int == 1) {
00474         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "Interface", (size_t) (NZ+1), &intid);
00475         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim Interface",status);
00476         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "Interface", NC_FLOAT, 1, &intid, &intvid);
00477         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var Interface",status);
00478         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, intvid, "units", 10, "Interface");
00479         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units Interface",status);
00480       }
00481 
00482       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) if (vars[k].z_grid == '2') {
00483           use_layer2 = 1; break;
00484       }
00485       if (use_layer2 == 1) {
00486         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "lay2", (size_t) 2, &lay2id);
00487         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim Lay2",status);
00488         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "lay2", NC_INT, 1, &lay2id, &layer2vid);
00489         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var Lay2",status);
00490         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, layer2vid, "long_name", 6, "Layer");
00491         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name Lay2",status);
00492         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, layer2vid, "units", 6, "Layer");
00493         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units Lay2",status);
00494       }
00495 
00496 
00497       *timeid = -1;
00498       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) if (vars[k].t_grid != '1') {
00499         status = nc_def_dim(*cdfid, "Time", NC_UNLIMITED, &dayid);
00500         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dim Time",status);
00501         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "Time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dayid, &dayvid);
00502         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var Time",status);
00503 # ifndef TIMEUNIT
00504         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, dayvid, "units", 5, "days");
00505 # else
00506         if (TIMEUNIT < 1800.0)
00507           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, dayvid, "units", 8, "seconds");
00508         else if ((TIMEUNIT >= 1800.0) && (TIMEUNIT < 4800.0))
00509           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, dayvid, "units", 6, "hours");
00510         else if ((TIMEUNIT >= 4800.0) && (TIMEUNIT < 200000.0))
00511           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, dayvid, "units", 5, "days");
00512         else
00513           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, dayvid, "units", 6, "years");
00514 # endif
00515         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units Time",status);
00516 
00517         dayavid = dayid; /* CORRECT THIS LINE LATER. */
00518         monthid = dayid; /* CORRECT THIS LINE LATER. */
00519 
00520         *timeid = dayvid;
00521         break;
00522       }
00523 
00524       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) if (vars[k].t_grid == 'a') {
00525         status = nc_def_var (*cdfid, "Time_St", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dayid, &daystvid);
00526         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Var Time",status);
00527         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, daystvid, "long_name", 31, 
00528                    "Start time of averaging period");
00529         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name Time_St",status);
00530 # ifndef TIMEUNIT
00531         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, daystvid, "units", 5, "days");
00532 # else
00533         if (TIMEUNIT < 1800.0)
00534           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, daystvid, "units", 8, "seconds");
00535         else if ((TIMEUNIT >= 1800.0) && (TIMEUNIT < 4800.0))
00536           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, daystvid, "units", 6, "hours");
00537         else if ((TIMEUNIT >= 4800.0) && (TIMEUNIT < 200000.0))
00538           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, daystvid, "units", 5, "days");
00539         else
00540           status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, daystvid, "units", 6, "years");
00541 # endif
00542         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Units Time",status);
00543 
00544         timeid[1] = daystvid;
00545 
00546         break;
00547       }
00548 
00549 #ifdef OUTPUT_DEFS
00550       status = nc_def_var(*cdfid, "KDML", NC_FLOAT, 0, &dummy, &kdmlvid);
00551       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("KDML",status);
00552       status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, kdmlvid, "long_name", 30, 
00553                                "Isopycnal diffusion coeff. ML");
00554       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name KDML",status);
00555 
00556       status = nc_def_var(*cdfid, "KD", NC_FLOAT, 0, &dummy, &kdvid);
00557       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("KD",status);
00558       status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, kdvid, "long_name", 27, 
00559                                "Isopycnal diffusion coeff.");
00560       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name KD",status);
00561 
00562       status = nc_def_var(*cdfid, "KHTR", NC_FLOAT, 0, &dummy, &khtrvid);
00563       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("KHTR",status);
00564       status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, khtrvid, "long_name", 27, 
00565                                "Diapycnal diffusion coeff.");
00566       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name KHTR",status);
00567 
00568       status = nc_def_var(*cdfid, "r_bio_tau", NC_DOUBLE, 0, &dummy, &tauvid);
00569       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("r_bio_tau",status);
00570       status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, tauvid, "long_name", 15, 
00571                                "Restoring time");
00572       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Name r_bio_tau",status);
00573 #endif /* OUTPUT_DEFS */
00574 
00575 
00576       for (k=0;k<novars;k++) {
00577         int dims[4], nodims = 0;
00578         nc_type mem_sz;
00579 
00580         switch (vars[k].t_grid) {
00581           case 's': dims[0] = dayid; varinfo[k].count[0] = 1; nodims = 1; break;
00582           case 'a': dims[0] = dayavid; varinfo[k].count[0] = 1; nodims = 1; break;
00583           case 'm': dims[0] = monthid; varinfo[k].count[0] = 1; nodims = 1; break;
00584           case '1': nodims = 0; break;
00585           default: fprintf(stderr,"Unknown time axis[%d] %c.\n",k,vars[k].t_grid);
00586         }
00587         switch (vars[k].z_grid) {
00588           case 'L': dims[nodims] = layerid; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = NZ;
00589                     varinfo[k].z_size = NZ; nodims++; break;
00590           case 'i': dims[nodims] = intid; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = NZ+1;
00591                     varinfo[k].z_size = NZ+1; nodims++; break;
00592           case '2': dims[nodims] = lay2id; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = 2;
00593                     varinfo[k].z_size = 2; nodims++; break;
00594           case '1': varinfo[k].z_size = 1; break;
00595           default: fprintf(stderr,"Unknown layer axis[%d] %c.\n",k,vars[k].z_grid);
00596         }
00597         switch (vars[k].hor_grid) {
00598           case 'u': dims[nodims] = lathid; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = yhsize;
00599                     dims[nodims+1] = lonqid; varinfo[k].count[nodims+1] = xqsize;
00600                     varinfo[k].x_size = xqsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yhsize;
00601                     nodims+=2; break;
00602           case 'v': dims[nodims] = latqid; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = yqsize;
00603                     dims[nodims+1] = lonhid; varinfo[k].count[nodims+1] = xhsize;
00604                     varinfo[k].x_size = xhsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yqsize;
00605                     nodims+=2; break;
00606           case 'h': dims[nodims] = lathid; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = yhsize;
00607                     dims[nodims+1] = lonhid; varinfo[k].count[nodims+1] = xhsize;
00608                     varinfo[k].x_size = xhsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yhsize;
00609                     nodims+=2; break;
00610           case 'q': dims[nodims] = latqid; varinfo[k].count[nodims] = yqsize;
00611                     dims[nodims+1] = lonqid; varinfo[k].count[nodims+1] = xqsize;
00612                     varinfo[k].x_size = xqsize; varinfo[k].y_size = yqsize;
00613                     nodims+=2; break;
00614           case '1': break;
00615           default: fprintf(stderr,"Unknown horizontal axes[%d] %c.\n",k,vars[k].hor_grid);
00616         }
00617 
00618         if (output_prec_float)
00619             mem_sz = NC_FLOAT;
00620         else if (vars[k].mem_size == 'd') mem_sz = NC_DOUBLE;
00621         else mem_sz = NC_FLOAT;
00622         status = nc_def_var(*cdfid, vars[k].name, mem_sz, nodims, 
00623                             dims, &varinfo[k].id);
00624         if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00625           strcpy(message,"Var "); strcat(message,vars[k].name);
00626           handle_error(message,status);
00627         }
00628 
00629         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, varinfo[k].id, "long_name", 
00630                                  strlen(vars[k].longname)+1, vars[k].longname);
00631         if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00632           strcpy(message,"Name "); strcat(message,vars[k].name);
00633           handle_error(message,status);
00634         }
00635         status = nc_put_att_text(*cdfid, varinfo[k].id, "units", 
00636                                  strlen(vars[k].units)+1, vars[k].units);
00637         if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00638           strcpy(message,"Units "); strcat(message,vars[k].name);
00639           handle_error(message,status);
00640         }
00641         status = nc_put_att_double(*cdfid, varinfo[k].id, "missing_value", 
00642                                  NC_DOUBLE, 1, &(vars[k].mval));
00643         if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00644           strcpy(message,"missing_value "); strcat(message,vars[k].name);
00645           handle_error(message,status);
00646         }
00647       }
00648 
00649     }
00650 
00651     status = nc_enddef(*cdfid);  /*leave define mode*/
00652     if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00653       strcpy(message,"End def "); strcat(message,filename);
00654       handle_error(message,status);
00655     }
00656 
00657 
00658 /*  Write all of the axis variables.                                  */
00659     {
00660       double *lathptr, *latqptr, *lonhptr, *lonqptr;
00661 # if (!defined(PARALLEL_Y) || defined(PARALLEL_IO))
00662       lathptr = &lath[Y1]; latqptr = &latq[Y0];
00663 # else
00664       lathptr = &lath_tot[Y1]; latqptr = &latq_tot[Y0];
00665 # endif
00666 # if (!defined(PARALLEL_X) || defined(PARALLEL_IO))
00667       lonhptr = &lonh[X1]; lonqptr = &lonq[X0];
00668 # else
00669       lonhptr = &lonh_tot[X1]; lonqptr = &lonq_tot[X0];
00670 # endif
00671 
00672       if (use_lath == 1) {
00673         status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, lathvid, lathptr);
00674         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put lath",status);
00675       }
00676 
00677       if (use_latq == 1) {
00678 # ifdef REENTRANT_Y
00679         status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, latqvid, latqptr+1);
00680 # else
00681         status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, latqvid, latqptr);
00682 # endif
00683         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put latq",status);
00684       }
00685 
00686       if (use_lonh == 1) {
00687         status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, lonhvid, lonhptr);
00688         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put lonh",status);
00689       }
00690 
00691       if (use_lonq == 1) {
00692 # ifdef REENTRANT
00693         status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, lonqvid, lonqptr+1);
00694 # else
00695         status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, lonqvid, lonqptr);
00696 # endif
00697         if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put lonq",status);
00698       }
00699     }
00700 
00701     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) layer[k] = k+1;
00702     if (use_layer == 1) {
00703       status = nc_put_var_int(*cdfid, layervid, layer);
00704       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put layer",status);
00705     }
00706   
00707     if (use_layer2 == 1) {
00708       status = nc_put_var_int(*cdfid, layer2vid, layer);
00709       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put layer2",status);
00710     }
00711 
00712     if (use_int == 1) {
00713       for (k=0;k<=NZ;k++) interface[k] = (float) k + 0.5;
00714       status = nc_put_var_float(*cdfid, intvid, interface);
00715       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Put interface",status);
00716     }
00717 
00718 #ifdef OUTPUT_DEFS
00719       status = nc_put_var_float(*cdfid, kdmlvid, &kdml);
00720       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("put KDML",status);
00721 
00722       status = nc_put_var_float(*cdfid, kdvid, &kd);
00723       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("put KD",status);
00724 
00725       status = nc_put_var_float(*cdfid, khtrvid, &khtr);
00726       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("put KHTR",status);
00727 
00728       status = nc_put_var_double(*cdfid, tauvid, &r_bio_tau);
00729       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("put r_bio_tau",status);
00730 #endif /* OUTPUT_DEFS */
00731   }
00732 #endif
00733 
00734 }
00735 
00736 void close_file(int *cdfid, FILE **fileptr) {
00737 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00738   if (*cdfid > -4) {
00739     if (*cdfid >= 0) {
00740       int status;
00741       status = nc_close(*cdfid);
00742       if (status != NC_NOERR) 
00743         handle_error("Closing file",status);
00744       *cdfid = -1;
00745     }
00746   }
00747   else
00748 #endif
00749   {
00750     if (*fileptr != NULL) fclose(*fileptr);
00751     *fileptr = NULL;
00752   }
00753 }
00754 
00755 void handle_error (char message[], int status) {
00756   fprintf(stderr,"PE %d: %s. Error code %d.\n",pe_here,message,status);
00757 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00758   fprintf(stderr,nc_strerror(status)); fprintf(stderr,"\n");
00759 #endif
00760   quit(status);
00761 }
00762 
00763 
00764 int name_output_file(char name[], double day, int noexdig,
00765                      char filepath[], char directory[])
00766 {
00767 /*   This subroutine opens a file with a name that is unique and      */
00768 /* reflects the size and time of the output.  The first two arguments */
00769 /* are the base names that will be used for double and float output   */
00770 /* files.  The time of the output is day.  If noexdig is nonzero,     */
00771 /* noexdig extra digits are added to the time stamp.                  */
00772 /*   This subroutine returns a pointer to the opened file and sets    */
00773 /* the value addressed by floatoutput to 1 for a float file and 0 for */
00774 /* a double file.                                                     */
00775 
00776   char filename[50];        /* The full name of the save file.        */
00777   char format[43];          /* The format for the file name.          */
00778   int j, numfig;
00779   size_t namesize;
00780 #if defined(SAVE_DOUBLE) || defined(NETCDF_OUTPUT)
00781   const int outsize = 8;
00782 #else
00783   const int outsize = sizeof(float);
00784 #endif
00785 
00786   if (day > 1e-6) {
00787     numfig = (int) (floor(log10(1e10*day)) + 1e-3) -
00788              (int) (floor(log10(1e10*(double)SAVEINT)) + 1e-3) + noexdig;
00789     numfig = (numfig > 8) ? 8 : ((numfig > 2) ? numfig : 2);
00790   }
00791   else numfig = 2;
00792 
00793   if ((outsize != 4) && (outsize != 8)) {
00794     for (j=0;j<((int) strlen(name));j++) {
00795       if (islower(name[j])) name[j] = toupper(name[j]);
00796       else if (isupper(name[j])) name[j] = tolower(name[j]);
00797     }
00798   }
00799   namesize = strlen(name);
00800 
00801 /*   The name of the file indicates whether it contains 4-byte or     */
00802 /* 8-byte numbers, by the way the time of the file is written.  It    */
00803 /* also indicates the horizontal size of the fields.  For example, an */
00804 /* 8-byte save file at time 1 will be "save1.00e00.50.80" for 50 x 80 */
00805 /* fields, while the corresponding 4-byte file is "save1.00e0.50.80". */
00806 
00807   sprintf(format,"%s%%%d.%de.%%03d.%%03d",name,numfig+5,numfig);
00808   sprintf(filename,format,day,NXTOT,NYTOT);
00809   if (filename[numfig+namesize+3]=='+') {
00810     for (j=numfig+namesize+3;j<=48;j++) filename[j] = filename[j+1];
00811     if ((outsize == 4) && (filename[numfig+namesize+3]=='0')) {
00812       for (j=numfig+namesize+3;j<=47;j++) filename[j] = filename[j+1];
00813     }
00814   }
00815   else if ((outsize == 4) && (filename[numfig+namesize+4]=='0')) {
00816     for (j=numfig+namesize+4;j<=47;j++) filename[j] = filename[j+1];
00817   }
00818 
00819   strcpy(filepath, directory);
00820   strcat(filepath, filename);
00821 
00822 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00823   return NETCDF_FILE;
00824 #else
00825   if (outsize == 8) return 0;
00826   else return FLOAT_FILE;
00827 #endif
00828 
00829 }
00830 
00831 void find_input_file(char name[], char name2[], char fltname[], double day,
00832                      char directory[], FILE **file, int *cdfid,
00833                      int *timeid)
00834 {
00835   char infile[150], inpath[300], inname[100];
00836   char format[30];
00837   int i, j, err = 1, namesize, try, try_nm, strip_0, flt_try;
00838 
00839 /* Read the velocities and thicknesses in from the saved binary files.*/
00840 
00841 /* Any non-netcdf file that is opened while stripping the extra 0 out */
00842 /* of the exponent in the file name or while using fltname is assumed */
00843 /* to contain 4-byte binary numbers.  Otherwise 8-byte binary numbers */
00844 /* are in a non-netcdf file.  Any of the 3 name arguments may be      */
00845 /* empty, in which case it is skipped.                                */
00846 
00847   for (try=0;try<=2;try++) {
00848     for (try_nm=0;try_nm<5;try_nm++) {
00849       if (try_nm==0) {strcpy(inname, name); strip_0 = 0; flt_try = 0;}
00850       else if (try_nm==1) {strcpy(inname, name2); strip_0 = 0; flt_try = 0;}
00851       else if (try_nm==2) {strcpy(inname, name); strip_0 = 1; flt_try = 0;}
00852       else if (try_nm==3) {strcpy(inname, name2); strip_0 = 1; flt_try = 0;}
00853       else {strcpy(inname, fltname); strip_0 = 0; flt_try = 1;}
00854 
00855       namesize = strlen(inname); if (namesize == 0) continue;
00856 
00857       for (i=8;i>=2;i--) {
00858         sprintf(format,"%s%%%d.%de.%%03d.%%03d",inname,i+5,i);
00859         sprintf(infile,format,day,NXTOT,NYTOT);
00860         if (infile[i+namesize+3]=='+') {
00861           for (j=i+namesize+3;j<=148;j++) infile[j] = infile[j+1];
00862           if (strip_0 && (infile[i+namesize+3]=='0')) {
00863             for (j=i+namesize+3;j<=47;j++) infile[j] = infile[j+1];
00864           }
00865         }
00866         else if (strip_0 && (infile[i+namesize+4]=='0')) {
00867           for (j=i+namesize+4;j<=147;j++) infile[j] = infile[j+1];
00868         }
00869         strcpy(inpath, directory); strcat(inpath, infile);
00870         err = open_input_file(inpath,file,cdfid,timeid);
00871         if (err == 0) {
00872           if ((flt_try || strip_0) && (*cdfid == -8)) *cdfid = -4;
00873           break;
00874         }
00875 
00876         strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00877         err = open_input_file(inpath,file,cdfid,timeid);
00878         if (err == 0) break;
00879       }
00880 
00881       if (err == 0) break;
00882     }
00883 
00884     if (err == 0) break;
00885     else day += day*1.0e-10*(1.0-6.0*(double)try+3.0*(double)(try*try));
00886   }
00887 
00888   if (err != 0) {
00889     printf("Unable to find input file.\n");
00890     printf("Last tried '%s'.\n",inpath);
00891     exit(-1);
00892   }
00893   else printf("Opened file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00894 }
00895 
00896 
00897 int open_input_file(char filename[], FILE **fileptr, int *cdfid, int *timeid) {
00898 
00899   int status, return_val = 0, i, j = 0;
00900 
00901 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00902   *fileptr = NULL;
00903   status = nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, cdfid);
00904   if (status != NC_NOERR)
00905     printf("status after opening %s: %d\n", filename, status);
00906 
00907 /*   The indices of all variables starting with "Time" are returned   */
00908 /* in timeid.                                                         */
00909   for (i=0;;i++) {
00910     int l;
00911     char varname[NC_MAX_NAME];
00912 
00913     if (NC_NOERR != nc_inq_varname(*cdfid,i,varname)) break;
00914     for (l=0;l<(int)strlen(varname);l++) varname[l] = tolower(varname[l]);
00915 
00916     if (strncmp(varname,"time",4) == 0 || strncmp(varname,"month",5) == 0) {
00917       timeid[0] = i;
00918       //hf timeid[j] = i; j++; //hf: bug! timeid is a scalar in calls!
00919     }
00920   }
00921 
00922   if (status != NC_NOERR)
00923 #endif
00924   {
00925     char *e;
00926 
00927     if (pe_here == 0) {
00928       *fileptr = fopen(filename,"rb"); // hf: this used to be "r"
00929       if (*fileptr == NULL) return_val = 1;
00930     }
00931     else *fileptr = NULL;
00932 
00933 /*    If a binary file is opened, cdfid indicates whether the file    */
00934 /*  contains 4-byte or 8-byte numbers.  This is determined from the   */
00935 /*  name of the file, as generated by name output file.  The time     */
00936 /*  of the file is written in the name in a way that contains this    */
00937 /*  information.  For example, a 8-byte save file at time 1 will be   */
00938 /*  "save1.00e00.50.80" for 50 x 80 fields, while the corresponding   */
00939 /*  4-byte file is "save1.00e0.50.80".                                */
00940     e = strrchr(filename,'e');
00941 
00942 /*
00943 if ((*(e+2) == '.') && ((*(e+1) >= '0') && (*(e+1) >= '0'))) *cdfid= -4;
00944 */
00945 
00946     if (((e != NULL) && (e+3-filename<strlen(filename))) &&
00947         ( ( (*(e+2) == '.') && (*(e+1) >= '0') && (*(e+1) <= '9') ) ||
00948           ( (*(e+1) == '-') && (*(e+3) == '.') &&
00949             (*(e+2) >= '0') && (*(e+2) <= '9') ) ) ) *cdfid = -4; 
00950 
00951 
00952     else *cdfid = -8;
00953 
00954     *timeid = 0;
00955   }
00956 
00957   return return_val;
00958 }
00959 
00960 void read_field(int cdfid, FILE *fileptr, char varname[], 
00961                 int size_x, int size_y, int size_z,
00962                 int start_file_x, int start_file_y, int start_file_z,
00963                 int start_array_x, int start_array_y, int start_array_z,
00964                 int recno, double variable[])
00965 {
00966   char message[500];
00967 
00968 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
00969   if (cdfid > -4) {
00970     int i, j, status, varid, ndims, dims_known, dimids[4];
00971     int xdim, ydim, zdim, tdim, varstart;
00972     size_t dimlen[4];
00973     size_t start[8], count[8];
00974     ptrdiff_t imap[8];
00975     char dimname[7][20];
00976     char message[144];
00977 
00978     status = nc_inq_varid (cdfid, varname, &varid);
00979     if (status != NC_NOERR) {
00980       strcpy(message,"Unable to get variable ID for ");strcat(message,varname);
00981       handle_error(message,status);
00982     }
00983 
00984     status = nc_inq_varndims(cdfid, varid, &ndims);
00985     if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Number of dimensions", status);
00986     if (ndims > 4) handle_error("Too many dimensions: ", ndims);
00987 
00988     status = nc_inq_vardimid(cdfid, varid, dimids);
00989     if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dimension ids", status);
00990 
00991 /*  This is the COARDS order of dimensions.                           */
00992     if (ndims == 4) {tdim = 0; zdim = 1; ydim = 2; xdim = 3;}
00993     else if (ndims == 3) {tdim = 4; zdim = 0; ydim = 1; xdim = 2;}
00994     else if (ndims == 2) {tdim = 4; zdim = 5; ydim = 0; xdim = 1;}
00995     else if (ndims == 1) {tdim = 4; zdim = 0; ydim = 6; xdim = 7;}
00996     else {tdim = 0; zdim = 0; ydim = 0; xdim = 0;}
00997 
00998     for (i=0;i<ndims;i++) {
00999       status = nc_inq_dim(cdfid, dimids[i], dimname[i], &dimlen[i]);
01000       if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("Dimension name", status);
01001       
01002       for (j=0;j<(int)strlen(dimname[i]);j++) dimname[i][j] = tolower(dimname[i][j]);
01003 
01004       if ((!strncmp(dimname[i],"lon",3)) || (dimname[i][0] == 'x'))
01005         {xdim = i; if (tdim == i) tdim = 4; if (ydim == i) ydim = 6; if (zdim == i) zdim = 5;}
01006       if ((!strncmp(dimname[i],"lat",3)) || (dimname[i][0] == 'y'))
01007         {ydim = i; if (tdim == i) tdim = 4; if (xdim == i) xdim = 7; if (zdim == i) zdim = 5;}
01008       if ((!strncmp(dimname[i],"lay",3)) || (dimname[i][0] == 'z'))
01009         {zdim = i; if (tdim == i) tdim = 4; if (xdim == i) xdim = 7; if (ydim == i) ydim = 6;}
01010       if ((!strncmp(dimname[i],"tim",3)) || (dimname[i][0] == 't'))
01011         {tdim = i; if (xdim == i) xdim = 7; if (ydim == i) ydim = 6; if (zdim == i) zdim = 5;}
01012     }
01013 
01014     dims_known = ((xdim < 4) ? 1 : 0) + ((ydim < 4) ? 1 : 0) +
01015                  ((zdim < 4) ? 1 : 0) + ((tdim < 4) ? 1 : 0);
01016     if (dims_known != ndims) {
01017       sprintf(message,"Unable to interpret dimensions - only %d known:\n",ndims);
01018       if (tdim < 6) strcat(message,dimname[tdim]); strcat(message,", ");
01019       if (zdim < 6) strcat(message,dimname[zdim]); strcat(message,", ");
01020       if (ydim < 6) strcat(message,dimname[ydim]); strcat(message,", ");
01021       if (xdim < 6) strcat(message,dimname[xdim]); strcat(message,", ");
01022       strcat(message,"\nOut of:  ");
01023       for (i=0;i<ndims;i++) {
01024         strcat(message,dimname[i]); strcat(message,", ");
01025       }
01026       strcat(message,"\nFor variable "); strcat(message,varname);
01027       handle_error(message, varid);
01028     }
01029 
01030 /* At this point the dimensions of the NetCDF field are known.        */
01031 
01032 
01033 /* Check that the length of the dimensions are sensible.              */
01034     if ((NXTOT+1) < size_x)
01035       handle_error("X-dimension to be read too large.",varid);
01036     if ((NYTOT+1) < size_y)
01037       handle_error("Y-dimension to be read too large.",varid);
01038     if ((NZ+1) < size_z)
01039       handle_error("Z-dimension to be read too large.",varid);
01040 
01041 /*   size_x = NXTOT or NXTOT+1, and size_y = NYTOT or NYTOT+1 mean    */
01042 /*  that entire dimesions are read based on the size in the file.     */
01043     if ((size_x == NXTOT) || (size_x == NXTOT+1)) {
01044       size_x = dimlen[xdim]; start_array_x = NXTOT+1-size_x;
01045     }
01046     if ((size_y == NYTOT) || (size_y == NYTOT+1)) {
01047       size_y = dimlen[ydim]; start_array_y = NYTOT+1-size_y;
01048     }
01049 
01050     count[zdim] = (size_z > 0) ? size_z : 1;   count[tdim] = 1;
01051 
01052     start[zdim] = start_file_z;   start[tdim] = recno;
01053 
01054     imap[ydim] = 1;
01055     imap[xdim] = ((size_y == 0) ? 1 : NYMEM);
01056     imap[zdim] = ((size_x == 0) ? 1 : NXMEM) * imap[xdim];
01057     imap[tdim] = NZ*NXMEM*NYMEM;
01058 
01059 /*   This block accounts for the possibility that this is a parallel  */
01060 /* simulation.  It makes sure that the current processor only reads   */
01061 /* its own data.                                                      */
01062     {
01063       double start_x, end_x, start_y, end_y;
01064 
01065       varstart = start_array_z*imap[zdim];
01066 
01067       if (size_x == 0) {count[xdim] = 1; start[xdim] = start_file_x;}
01068       else {
01069         start_x = (start_array_x-X0abs > nx-X0) ? nx+1-X0 :
01070                    start_array_x-X0abs;
01071         if (start_x < 0) start_x = 0;
01072         end_x = (size_x-1+start_array_x-X0abs >= nx-X0) ? nx-X0 : 
01073                  size_x-1+start_array_x-X0abs;
01074         if (end_x < 0) end_x = -1;
01075 
01076         count[xdim] = (end_x < start_x) ? 0 : end_x - start_x + 1;
01077         start[xdim] = start_x + X0abs - start_array_x + start_file_x;
01078         varstart += (X0+start_x)*imap[xdim];
01079       }
01080 
01081       if (size_y == 0) {count[ydim] = 1; start[ydim] = start_file_y;}
01082       else {
01083         start_y = (start_array_y-Y0abs > ny-Y0) ? ny+1-Y0 :
01084                    start_array_y-Y0abs;
01085         if (start_y < 0) start_y = 0;
01086         end_y = (size_y-1+start_array_y-Y0abs >= ny-Y0) ? ny-Y0 : 
01087                  size_y-1+start_array_y-Y0abs;
01088         if (end_y < 0) end_y = -1;
01089 
01090         count[ydim] = (end_y < start_y) ? 0 : end_y - start_y + 1;
01091         start[ydim] = start_y + Y0abs - start_array_y + start_file_y;
01092         varstart += Y0+start_y;
01093       }
01094 
01095     }
01096 
01097     if (count[xdim]*count[ydim] > 0) {
01098       
01099       status = nc_get_varm_double(cdfid, varid, start, count, NULL, 
01100                                   imap, &variable[varstart]);
01101       if (status != NC_NOERR) {
01102         sprintf(message,"Reading field %s",varname);
01103         handle_error(message,status);
01104       } 
01105    }
01106 
01107   } else
01108 #endif
01109   {
01110 /*  Here a field is read from a binary file.                          */
01111     int k, flt;
01112     size_t err = 1;
01113     
01114     flt = (cdfid == -4) ? 1 : 0;
01115 
01116     if (start_array_z+size_z > NZ) {
01117       strcpy(message,"Vertical offset + size too large to read ");strcat(message,varname);
01118       handle_error(message,-1);
01119     }
01120 
01121     if (((size_x == NXTOT) || (size_x == NXTOT+1)) &&
01122         ((size_y == NYTOT) || (size_y == NYTOT+1)))
01123     {
01124       for (k=start_array_z;k<size_z+start_array_z;k++) 
01125         err *= read_layer(variable+k*NXMEM*NYMEM,fileptr,flt);
01126     }
01127     else if (((size_x == 0) && (size_y == 0))) {
01128       if (pe_here == 0) err *= fread((void *)variable,8*size_z,1,fileptr);
01129       spread_double_vector(variable,size_z);
01130     }
01131     else {
01132       strcpy(message,"Only full layers or single columns are supported with binary files.  Variable ");
01133       strcat(message,varname);
01134       handle_error(message,-1);
01135     }
01136   }
01137 }
01138 
01139 size_t read_time(int cdfid, FILE *fileptr, int timeid, size_t nrec, 
01140                  double *day)
01141 {
01142 #ifdef NETCDF_OUTPUT
01143   if (cdfid > -4) {
01144     if (cdfid >= 0) {
01145       int status;
01146       char message[144];
01147 
01148       status = nc_get_var1_double(cdfid, timeid, &nrec, day);
01149       if (status != NC_NOERR) {
01150         sprintf(message,"Reading time %d",timeid);
01151         handle_error(message,status);
01152       }
01153     }
01154     return 1;
01155   }
01156   else
01157 #endif
01158   {
01159     size_t err = 1;
01160     if (pe_here==0) err *= fread((void *)day,8,1,fileptr);
01161     return err;
01162   }
01163 }
Generated on Thu Sep 30 14:23:06 2010 for Offtrac by  1.6.3
